post.body: Ling-ur-eee.
Ha ha he he ha ha ho.
A can of frosting and Cheez-Its.
I'm in love with Anthony Green cd :B Why didn't I take interest in Shelbz's musical preference from the start?
Reminising about our little wilderness adventure.
My stupidity is unfortunate. At least I have Shane to point it out.
I love Shane.
I wish to have a hundred yard flamingos to place around my L.A. home and a Duck X-ing sign.
I want my fucking Hufflepuff shirt that is non existant.
Shane Alan is my Cho Chang. He is the reason I didn't get back to the cup in time.
I will be holding a Triwizard Tournement in the very near future.
My feet are dancing to Harry Potter Soundtrack.
Chocolate cupcakes and vanilla frosting with sprinkles.
I have a horrendously painful headache.
Little Miss Vixen.
I am 2 hours away from being awake for 24 hours straight.
Nightly Owl City lyrics text to Shane :B
Shane and I are staking out in my car and he is eating tourtured chickens.
Well Shane has dragged us all to some random party at the Asian Sports Center, and low and behold it's full of asians. Who would've thought?
Shane got me cheese crackers and I'm happy as fuck.
You son of a bitch!
UGGGGGGGs!
Where my book at?!
Howie Mandel would've been put in the ground had he attended Elk Grove High School.
AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH! Luna voicemails! :))))))
Writing my musical.
HO MAH GAHD Luna baby! We is followin each otha on the Twiiter.
I have been sitting here believing it's 9:40 when in reality the time on my alarm was ahead an hour WTF I'm so confused right now.
3 hours 43 minutes until I need to wake up. I get to see my Snuggies today :)
SNUGGIE COMMERCIAL.
I wish Shelbz would calculate the exact time and place I will start my period with the magical G1.
Dear Shane, I would never permit such a heinous, god awful act and I will wear toe socks for all eternity to repel you.
Dear Shane, I am cold, hint hint.
SNUGGIE COMMERCIAL.
I'm begining to think that everyone but Shelbz and I own a Snuggie.
Um blankets are OK but they can slip and slide, plus my hands are trapped inside, but the Snuggie keeps me totally warm & my hands are FREE.
I am a phone call away from super soft luxurious fleece w/ oversized sleeves that let me do what I want & still be totally wrapped in warmth
O-M-G SNUGGIE DOUBLE OFFER! 2 SNUGGIES AND 2 BOOKLIGHTS FOR ONLY $19.95(+$7.95 for S&H and then an extra $7.95 for 2nd Snuggie). HOLY SHIT.
With nothin' but my Snuggie on...OMG SNUGGIE COMMERCIAL IS ON AS I TYPE THIS.
Hey boyz, Shelbz and I are in our Snuggies. Come over and we'll use our free booklights ;)
